Original: <@RL,Boy2,00>あ きみたちは さっきの...<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,00>さっきは あねごに なめたまね<CD>してくれたじゃね-か!<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>あの女の子のこと? もしかして<CD>どこか けがを したのかい?<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,00>ふん! お前みたいな やさ男に<CD>けが させられるほど<CF><D1>あねごは やわじゃねえ!<CF><D1>だけど おれたち スクリュ-ズの<CD>ボス ふうリんのキクヒメに<CF><D1>ぶつかっておいて「ごめん」じゃ<CD>すまね-よなぁ<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>「ふうリんのキクヒメ」?<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,03>おう あねごが<CD>ふうリんの キクヒメで<CF><D1>おれが せんこうのイワノイ<CD>そして こいつが<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,01>うちわのカガミヤマだ!<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,03>3人合わせて なく子も だまる<CD>スクリュ-ズって わけよ!<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,00>わけだ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>何 言ってんだか<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>それで そのスクリュ-ズの人たちが<CD>ぼくに 何のよう?<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,03>あねごの かたきを<CD>うちに 来たのさ!<CF><D1>あねごは お前と ぶつかってから<CF><D1>ホテルのヘやで ずっと ぼ--っと<CD>したまんま ヘんじも しなくなった<CF><D1>こうなったのも 全て お前と<CD>ぶつかったせいだ!<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,02>せいだ!<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,03>えっ そんな...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>また ヘんな 言いがかリを<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,03>かくごしろよ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>まったく!
Translated: <@RL,Boy2,00>Oh, aren't you...<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,00>You really made light of our boss earlier!<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>Do you mean, that girl? Did she get hurt somehow?<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,00>Hmph! She's not so weak that a frail guy like you would be able to hurt her!<CF><D1>But, "Sorry~" isn't enough to make up for bumping into Samantha the Swift, the boss of the Screws herself! <CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>Samantha the Swift?<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,03>Yeah! Together, we are the Screws!<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,00>That's right!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>What are they on about?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>So, what do the Screws want from me?<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,03>We're here to avenge our boss!<CF><D1>After you bumped into her, she's been staring at nothing in her hotel room all day! But...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>They're accusing someone of something strange again...<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,03>Prepare yourself!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>Geez!

Original: <@RL,Spyke,01>あっ あねごっ!<CD>元気に なったんですかい!?<CF><D1><@CC,CLEAR,FF>ドカッ! バキッ!
Translated: <@RL,Spyke,01>Boss! Are you okay now?<CF><D1><@CC,CLEAR,FF><f09>WHACK! BAM!

Original: <@RL,Spyke,05>わあっ!<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,03>イ イタイ...<CF><D1><@RL,Samantha,02>勝手なまね すんじゃないよっ!
Translated: <@RL,Spyke,05>Woah!<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,03>T-that hurts...<CF><D1><@RL,Samantha,02>Don't go doing things I didn't ask for!

Original: <@RL,Samantha,04>ごめんなさぁい<CD>けが しなかったあ?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>あ うん ぼくは<CD>だいじょうぶ...だけど<CF><D1><@RL,Samantha,03>よかったぁ こんどから 何か<CD>こまったことが あったら<CF><D1>言ってよねぇ<CD>あたし 力に なるからさぁ<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>???<CD>あ...あリがとう...
Translated: <@RL,Samantha,04>Sorry~ Are you hurt?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>Uh, I'm not hurt. Not me, at least.<CF><D1><@RL,Samantha,03>Thank goodness... If you ever run into any problems, just let me know. I'll be there to help.<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>??? T-thank you...?

Original: <@RL,Samantha,02>行くよ! お前たち!
Translated: <@RL,Samantha,02>Hey, we're leaving!

Original: <@RL,Spyke,04>そんなぁ あねごぉ-
Translated: <@RL,Spyke,04>But... Boss!

Original: <@RL,Sloan,00>まって!
Translated: <@RL,Sloan,00>Wait!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>な...何だったんだ...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>W-what was that all about?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>あの
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Um...

Original: <@RL,Boy2,00>? きみは?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>あ とつぜんごめん<CD>その さっきのことなんだけど<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>スクリュ-ズとか言う<CD>人たちのこと?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>うん そうなんだけど<CF><D1>やつらとは ちょっとした<CD>知リ合いだから 気になったんだ<CF><D1>何が あったか おしえてくれない?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>さっき あの キクヒメって<CD>女の子と ぶつかったんだ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>うん それで?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>それだけだよ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>そっ それだけ?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>うん<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>えぇ?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>あ もう ぼく 行かなきゃ!<CD>それじゃ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>あっ!
Translated: <@RL,Boy2,00>? Who are you?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Oh, sorry for bothering you. About what just happened with those guys...<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>The Screws... or whatever they called themselves?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Yeah, I'm curious since I'm kinda acquainted with those people.<CF><D1>Do you mind telling me the whole story?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>The girl, Samantha... I bumped into her earlier.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>I see... and?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>That's it.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>T-that's it?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>Yeah.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>Huh?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>Oh, I gotta go. Bye!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>Ah...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>キクヒメと あの男の子が ぶつかって<CD>キクヒメが ぼ-っと なった...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>Samantha and him bumped into each other, then she began staring into nothing...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>キクヒメのやつ まさか!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>...だとしたら あの男の子<CD>かわいそうに
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Don't tell me that she's--!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>...If it's true, I feel really bad for him.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>それにしても やつら どこに?<CD>さっきの イワノイの 話だと...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>ホテルに とまってるとか!?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>いつの間に...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Still, where are they? I think Spyke said something about...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>Are they staying at the hotel!?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>When did they have the time to...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>エスカレ-タ-は こうじ中だってさ<CD>今は 使えないみたいだ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>It seems the escalator is under construction. So I can't use it at the moment.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>こうじ中の エスカレ-タ-がある<CF><D1>「スカイパ-クヘ 行かれる方は<CD>エレベ-タを ご利用下さい」だって<CF><D1>メダリンピックが おわるころには<CD>こうじも おわってるみたいだ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>The escalator is under construction.<CF><D1><f02>To go to Sky Park, please use the elevator instead,<f00> it says.<CF><D1>It seems the construction will be finished by the time Medalympics end.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>「もう少しで かんせいします」<CD>だって...まだ 使えないようだ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00><f02>The construction will be finished very soon<f00>, it says... I guess I still can't use it.

Original: <@RL,Mystery,00>ちょっと まちなさい
Translated: <@RL,Mystery,00>Hold it right there.

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>あなた なぜパ-ツを ひろわないの?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>その答え 貝つけてみる?
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>Why aren't you picking up the part?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Wanna find out why?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>分かった?<CF><D1>生まれた場所 そだった場所は<CD>ちがっても ぼくも きみも<CF><D1>同じ メダロッタ- 同じ人間なんだ<CD>それなのに 何できみは 自分と<CF><D1>地上にすんでる人との 間に<CD>かベを 作っちゃうの?<CF><D1>そういうのって いみ ないよね<CF><D1><@RL,Lady3,00>ふふっ あなたには まけたわ<CD>何も言わずに うけとリなさい<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>あ あリがと...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Got it now?<CF><D1>We may have been born and raised in different places. But you and I... We're Medafighters, we're both humans. Why put up a wall between you and people from the surface?<CF><D1>What meaning is there?<CF><D1><@RL,Lady3,00>Hee hee, you beat me.<D3>No buts, just take it.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>T-thanks...

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>ふふん 今の ことば なかなか<CD>心に グッと 来るじゃない
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>Hee hee, those words struck my heart.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>なんだか 知らないけど ラッキ-だ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Anyways, lucky me.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>にさんかマンガンに かさんかすいそ水<CD>を くわえると さんそが出るぞ-!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Add hydrogen peroxide to manganese dioxide and it will release oxygen!

Original: <@RL,Man,00>けんかは ほどほどにな-!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Don't fight too much!

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>わたし 先生のじゅぎょうが すきなの<CD>だから いつも 学校に来るの
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>I always go to school because I like the teacher's class.

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>つまリ 水を 電気ぶんかいすると<CD>すいそと さんそに分かれるのですね
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>So with electrolysis, water splits into hydrogen and oxygen.

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>つまリ おやつに マスクメロンを<CD>持って来ると ケンカになるのですね
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>So when I bring muskmelon for a snack, a fight will break out.

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>今日は おやつに マスクメロンを<CD>持って来たんだ いいだろ-
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>I brought muskmelon for a snack today! Isn't it great?

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>今日は おやつに マスクメロンを<CD>持ってくるつもリだったけど<CF><D1>また ケンカになるのが いやだから<CD>おやつは がまんしたよ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>ぼくは 学校に おやつを 持って来て<CD>いいのかどうかが 知リたいよ
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>I was going to bring muskmelon today, but I don't want people to fight over it again. So I decided against it.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>I'm more concerned about if it's really okay to bring snacks to school.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>今日は 先生のすきな 国語だ
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Today's my favorite subject, Japanese.

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>あの先生 いつも 自分のすきな<CD>じゅぎょうを するんだよ
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>That teacher always loves teaching his favorite subject.

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>先生の じゅぎょうは 大変<CD>きょうみぶかい ふむふむ
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>His class is so interesting. Mm-hmm.

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>ぼくはしょうらい いしゃに なるのだ<CF><D1>だから 今のうちに<CD>ベんきょう ベんきょう!
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>I'm going to be a doctor in the future!<CF><D1>That's why I'm studying!

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>そこの あなた! いいものあげるわ!<CD>地上人って びんぼうなんでしょ?
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>You there! I have something for you!<D3>You surface dwellers are poor, right?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>女の子が パ-ツを足下に おとした<CD>プライドをすてて ひろっちゃえ!?<*04>
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>The girl dropped a part at my feet. Should I put aside my pride to pick it up!?<*04>

Original: <@LL,Ikki,01>ラッキ-!<CF><D1><@RL,Lady3,00>地上人は お金もプライドもないのね
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,01>Lucky!<CF><D1><@RL,Lady3,00>You surface dwellers have no money nor pride, huh?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,02>バカにするなっ!<CD>それに その 地上人って言い方も<CF><D1>きみの たいども 気にいらないねっ!<CF><D1><@RL,Lady3,00>ふんっ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,02>Don't look down on me!<D3>And I don't like how you said surface dwellers either!<CF><D1><@RL,Lady3,00>Hmph!

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>何? パ-ツがほしいの?<CD>やっぱリあなたは 地上人ね
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>What? You want parts?<D3>You're a surface dweller after all, huh?

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>ふん! あなたのかお わすれないわよ
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>Hmph! I'll remember you.

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>前のせきの子 むかしから せいかく<CD>わるかったけど<CF><D1>そうリだいじんの むすめが来てから<CD>さらに わるくなったわ!
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>The girl sitting in front of me has an attitude, which got even worse since the Prime Minister's daughter came here!

Original: きみ!
Translated: You!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>何 やってんの?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>What's going on?

Original: <@RL,Erika,05>あの先生が もんだいを 出して<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,03>答えられなかったから ここで<CD>ベんきょう させられてるんだ
Translated: <@RL,Erika,05>That teacher gave me a question I couldn't answer.<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,03>We couldn't answer, so we're being forced to stay here and study.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>きみ ちゃんと ベんきょうしてるか?<CD>してるなら このもんだいに<CF><D1>答えてみなさい 答えられなかったら<CD>きみも ここで ベんきょうしなさい<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>え? 何で?
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Have you been diligently studying? Prove it by answering this question. If you can't, then stay here and study too.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>Eh? Why?

Original: <@RL,Man,00>「はい」か「いいえ」で 答えなさい<CD>だい1もん!!!<CF><D1>メダロットの 頭パ-ツは<CD>院にも つけられる?<*04>
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Answer with "Yes" or "No", first question!!<CF><D1>Can you attach a Medabot's head part to its arms?<*04>

Original: <@RL,Man,00>ふむ では だい2もん!<CF><D1>ひこう型メダロットに よくきく<CD>こうげきは アンチシ-である?<*04>
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Hmph, well then, question 2!<CF><D1>Are anti-sea attacks effective against flying-type Medabots?<*04>

Original: <@RL,Man,00>それでは さいごの もんだい!<CF><D1>わたしの父さんのきょうだいの母さんの<CD>いとこの親せきの友だちの知リ合いの<CF><D1>おじいさんの兄さんのよく行く公園の<CD>そばの家の近くは きみの家に近い?<*04>
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>And now for the last question!<CF><D1>Is the house near my father's sibling's mother's cousin's relative's friend's acquaintance's grandfather's big brother's oft visited park close to your house?<*04>

Original: <@RL,Man,00>む! ぜんもんせいかいだ!<CD>よくベんきょう してるね
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Mm! You got them all correct! You've been studying well, I see.

Original: <@RL,Koji,03>さいごの もんだい よく分かったな!<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,06>あんなの はんそくよ!
Translated: <@RL,Koji,03>You figured out that last question!<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,06>You cheated!

Original: <@RL,Man,00>ん きみ 今のは じょうだんだよね?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>あ あたリまえじゃ ないですか!<CF><D1><@RL,Man,00>それでは もう1回 行くよ?
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Mm, that just now was a joke, right?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>N-naturally!<CF><D1><@RL,Man,00>Okay then, let's try again.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>ごほうびを あげよう
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Let me give you a reward.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>せっかく 来たんだ<CD>きみも じゅぎょうを うけなさい
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>You should join my class while you're at it.

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>え きみ 地上に すんでるの?<CD>あ そうか びんぼうなんだね
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>Eh? You live at the surface? I see, you must be poor.

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>きみは メダロット何体もってる?<CD>やっぱリ100体は きほんだよね
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>How many Medabots do you have? 100 is the standard, no?

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>あら 今日はみんな 家かしら?
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>My, is everyone at home today?

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>1番前のせきって 1番目立たない<CD>せき だよなぁ 気づいてほしいよ
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>The very front seat is actually the least conspicuous. I want to be noticed.

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>はい! そこ しずかにするっ!
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>Hey! Be quiet!

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>あら 地上の人は 学校に 行かなくて<CD>いいの?
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>My, is school not compulsory for people from the surface?

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>わたくし じょうばを ならってますの<CD>あなたは 何を ならってますの?
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>I'm applying myself to learning horse riding. What about you?

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>今日は ママに何を買って<CD>もらおうかしら
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>What shall I ask mom to buy me today?

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>あなたの おうちはお金もち?<CD>ちがうの? ふ-ん クスクス!
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>Is your family rich? No? I see... Hee hee!

Original: <@RL,Man,00>このベンチで ぼ-っとするのが<CD>しゅみなんだ
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Sitting here doing nothing is my pastime.

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>この公園には ねがいごとを かなえる<CD>さんばしが あるみたいだけど<CF><D1>ぼくたちは パパに おねだリすると<CD>何でも 買ってもらえるからね<CF><D1>あんまリ 気にしてないんだよね
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>Rumor has it that in this park, there's a bridge that can grant your wishes.<CF><D1>But we can just ask our dad to buy us anything we want.<CF><D1>So I'm not really interested.

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>あ-あ この間 買ってもらった<CD>メダロットも あきちゃったわ<CF><D1>新しいの パパに買ってもらおっ
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>Aww... I'm already tired of the Medabot that I got the other day.<CF><D1>I'll ask dad to buy me a new one.

Original: <@RL,Clerk,00>おきゃくさまの おヘやは<CD>4Fで ございます
Translated: <@RL,Clerk,00>The room is on 4F.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>目つきのわるい 3人租 とまってる?<CF><D1><@RL,Clerk,00>ええ とまってますよ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>Do you know any group of three with scary eyes staying in this hotel?<CF><D1><@RL,Clerk,00>Yes, I've seen them.

Original: <@RL,Clerk,00>3Fと 4Fは エアロホテルと<CD>なっておリます
Translated: <@RL,Clerk,00>3F and 4F are part of the Aero Hotel.

Original: <@RL,Samantha,00>何よぉ しつこいわねぇ イワノイ<CD>あたしなら いないわよぉ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>いや ぼく<CD><&BUF0A>なんだけど<CF><D1><@RL,Samantha,04><&BUF0A>? あたし 今<CD>いないことに なってるしぃ
Translated: <@RL,Samantha,00>Spyke, you're being persistent. I'm not here.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>No, it's me, <&BUF0A>.<CF><D1><@RL,Samantha,04><&BUF0A>? Anyway, I've decided that I'm not here right now.

Original: <@RL,Samantha,04>何よぉ あたし 今<CD>いないことに なってんだからぁ
Translated: <@RL,Samantha,04>What? Like I said, I've decided that I'm not here right now.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>いない! こんな時に!<CF><D1>イワノイなら キクヒメのいばしょ<CD>知ってるかも!?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>Samantha's not here! Why!?<CF><D1>Maybe Spyke knows where she is!?

Translated: <@RL,Spyke,04>Huh? Who is it?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Spyke? It's me, <&BUF0A>.<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,04>Huh. It's not locked. Come in.

Original: <@RL,Spyke,04>あん? だれだぁ?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>イワノイ!<CD>キクヒメを 知らないか!?<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,00>はぁ? あねごなら ヘやに

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>いないんだよ! もしかしたら<CD><&BUF07>に 言われて<CF><D1>地下に むかったのかも!?<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,00>何だと? 地下?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>せつめいしてる 時間はない!<CD>いっしょに 来てくれ!

Oh well, anything for my dear Gull's big brother.<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>Ah! It's under your foot!<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,00>My, you're right! Let's pick it up and proceed. What's next? Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>ここらヘんに カ-ドキ-とやらが<CD>おちてるはずだ<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,04>あたしに さがせって 言うのぉ?<CD>ま いとしい カモメさまの<CF><D1>お兄さまの ためじゃ<CD>しょ-がないけどさぁ<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>たぶん今 お前が 足で<CD>ふんでいる やつだ<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,00>あらぁ 本当!<CD>じゃ ひろって 行きましょ<CF><D1>それで? お次は エレベ-タ-?<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>そうだ いそげ
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>There should be a keycard of some kind laying about around here.<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,04>Are you telling me to search for it? Oh well, anything for my dear Gull's big brother.<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>It's probably the one you're standing on.<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,00>My, you're right! Let's pick it up and proceed. What's next? The elevator?<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>Correct, let us hurry.

Original: <@LR,Samantha,04>何だか きかいばっかリで<CD>かんじわるい 場所ねぇ<CF><D1>本当に カモメさまの お兄さまは<CD>こんな所に いるのぉ?
Translated: <@LR,Samantha,04>There are only machines wherever I look. This place is giving me the creeps.<CF><D1>Is his big brother really here?

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>じゃね-の?
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>Isn't he?

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>だぶんな
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>Most likely.

Original: <@RL,Spyke,05>あねご!<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,00>ん? なぁにぃ? イワノイ<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>何だ?
Translated: <@RL,Spyke,05>Boss!<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,00>Hm? What is it, Spyke?<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>What?

Original: <@RL,Spyke,05>あねご!<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,00>ん? なぁにぃ? イワノイ<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>何だ?
Translated: <@RL,Spyke,05>Boss!<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,00>Hm? What is it, Spyke?<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>What?

Original: <@LR,Samantha,00>イワノイから トランシ-バ-で<CD>れんらくが 入ったのよぉ<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,05>ぶじですかい! あねご!<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,00>当たリ前でしょお 何言ってんのよぉ<CF><D1><@RR,Ikki,07>キクヒメ! 聞こえるか!<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,04>何よぉ <&BUF0A><CD>耳元で どならないでよぉ<CF><D1><@RR,Ikki,06>今 どこに いるんだ? キクヒメ<CD><&BUF07>は いっしょか?<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,00>今ぁ? あんたの メダロットに<CD>言われて 地下に いるわよぉ<CF><D1>カ-ドキ-ってやつ ひろったからぁ<CF><D1><@RR,Ikki,07>よく聞いて! キクヒメ<CD>もう もどってる 時間は ないんだ!<CF><D1>今は キクヒメだけが たよリなんだ!<CF><D1>エレベ-タ-は そのかいまでだけど<CD>かいだんで 下のかいに 行けるんだ!<CF><D1>下に おリたら コンピュ-タ-を<CD>そうさして<CF><D1>エレベ-タ-を<CD>手動に 切リかえてほしい<CF><D1>そうしたら カ-ドキ-がなくても<CD>ぼくらも そっちに 行ける!<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,04>コンピュ-タ-って 言われても<CF><D1>そういうのは イワノイの<CD>せんもん分野なのよねぇ<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,00>あねご! そこについたら<CD>おれが せつめいしますぜ!<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,00>分かったわぁ ともかく<CD>そこに 行けば いいのねぇ
Translated: <@LR,Samantha,00>Spyke is talking to me through my transceiver.<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,05>Boss! Are you okay!?<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,00>Of course I am. What are you saying?<CF><D1><@RR,Ikki,07>Samantha! Can you hear me!?<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,04>Hey, <&BUF0A>. Don't shout next to my ear.<CF><D1><@RR,Ikki,06>Samantha, where are you? Are you with <&BUF07> right now?<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,00>Right now? Your Medabot told me to go to the basement, so here I am.<CF><D1>I already got the keycard and all.<CF><D1><@RR,Ikki,07>Listen! There's no time to return anymore!<CF><D1>You're the only one who can do this!<CF><D1>The elevator only doesn't go any lower than where you are, so use the stairs to go down!<CF><D1>You'll find a computer there. Operate it to set the elevator to manual mode.<CF><D1>That way, we'll ge able to get to your side even without a keycard!<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,04>A computer?<CF><D1>Spyke is the one who's good with computers.<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,00>Boss! I'll guide you through the steps when you get there!<CF><D1><@LR,Samantha,00>Alright. I just need to head there for now, right?

Original: <@LR,Samantha,00>何だか ややこしいわねぇ<CF><D1>ともかく 行くわよぉ<CD><&BUF07>
Translated: <@LR,Samantha,00>Sounds complicated.<CF><D1>Anyway, let's go, <&BUF07>.

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>おう!
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>Yeah!

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>ああ さっさと 行くぞ
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>Right, and we should pick up the pace.

Original: <@RL,Spyke,00>そろそろ<CD>あらわれると 思ってたぜ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>お前ら どうやって<CD>ここに 来たんだよ<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,00>お前が つれてってくれね-からよ<CD>ここには 小さくなって 来たのさ<CF><D1>ロボロボ団と いっしょにな<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>ミニミニマシ-ン!?<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,00>あの 変な マシンは そ-いう<CD>名前なのか 何か まんまだな<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>ミニミニマシ-ンの せいで<CD>くろう させられるよ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>...って言うか お前ら どうやって<CD>ホテルに とまったんだ?<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,00>こまかいことは 気にすんな<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>(いいのか...?)<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,04>ともかくよ あねごが あれじゃ<CD>スクリュ-ズも どうなることやら<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>キクヒメ...やっぱリ<CD>ひょっとして<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,02>「ひと目ぼれ」なんて 言うなぁっ!!
Translated: <@RL,Spyke,00>About time you showed up.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>How did you guys get here?<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,00>Since you wouldn't take us with you, we had to turn small to reach this place.<CF><D1>...With the Rubberobo Gang.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>Did you use the MiniMini Machine!?<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,00>Is that the name of that strange tool? Well, that's self-explanatory.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>I went through so much trouble because of that machine.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>...Anyway, how come you're staying at the hotel?<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,00>Don't worry about trivial things like that.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>(Trivial...?)<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,04>Never mind all that. At this rate, it's going to be over for the Screws.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>Samantha... So she's really...<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,02>Don't call it "Love at first sight"!!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>まだ 言ってないよ<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,02>あいつ こんど 貝つけたら<CD>ギッタンギッタンに してやる!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>ひどい めいわくな 話だな それ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>I haven't said anything.<CF><D1><@RL,Spyke,02>The next time I see him, I'll beat him to a pulp!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>That sounds like trouble.

Original: <@RL,Spyke,02>くっそ- あのやろう<CD>こんど会ったら ぶつぶつぶつ...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>しばらく ほっとこう
Translated: <@RL,Spyke,02>Damn that guy! The next time I see him...<CF><f09>mutter mutter mutter<f08>...<f00><CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>I should leave him alone for now.

Original: <@RL,BipedMedabot,00>おれさまは<CD>オオカミに 生まれ変わったのさ!
Translated: <@RL,BipedMedabot,00>I was reborn as a wolf!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>ふう-<CF><D1>なんだか いろんなことが あリすぎて<CD>つかれたなぁ ヘやにもどろ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>Phew...<CF><D1>What a hectic day. I'm tired... <D3>I'll go back to my room.

Original: <@RL,Sloan,00>だぁれ?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>カガミヤマ?<CD><&BUF0A>だけど<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,00>ドア あいてる
Translated: <@RL,Sloan,00>Who is it?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Sloan? It's me, <&BUF0A>.<CF><D1><@RL,Sloan,00>The door isn't locked.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>先に キクヒメの 所に 行かなきゃ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>I need to find Samantha first!

Original: <@RL,Sloan,01>貝て! ぼくのヘや<CD>きれいでしょ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>お前は ヘいわだな
Translated: <@RL,Sloan,01>Look! Isn't my room clean?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>You're the definition of peaceful.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>テンリョウ <&BUF0A>さま<CD>ですね おむかえに まいリました<CF><D1>さあ しゅっぱつ しましょう<*04>
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Mr. <&BUF0A> Tenryou, I have come for you.<CF><D1>Let us depart.<*04>

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>もうちょっと まってて下さい<CF><D1><@RL,Man,00>分かリました
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Please hold on a moment.<CF><D1><@RL,Man,00>Very well.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>おっと その前に ちょっと
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Oh, before we go...

Original: <@RL,Man,00>えリを きちっと...そでを<CD>もっと こう...
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Straighten the collar... and the sleeves...

Original: <@RL,Man,00>そうリの前に 立つのですから<CD>少しは みなリを よくしませんと<CF><D1>では まいリましょう
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>You will be in the presence of the Prime Minister, so you have to mind your appearance.<CF><D1>Well then, let's go.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>むかいのヘやで おまち下さい
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Please wait in the opposite room.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>ちょうリ場は コックの せんじょうだ<CD>しろうとは 入って来るんじゃねぇ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>ご ごめんなさい!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>The kitchen is a chef's battlefield! You can't just come in here!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>S-sorry!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,01>リょうリ とっても おいしかったです<CF><D1><@RL,Man,00>ば ばかやろう! めしを うまく<CD>するのは ココ コックのしごとだ!<CF><D1>ベベ ベつに てめぇらの ために<CD>作ったんじゃねぇ! ってやんでい!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,01>The food was really delicious.<CF><D1><@RL,Man,00>S-stupid! As a chef, it's my job to make delicious food!<CF><D1>I-i-it's not like I'm made them for your sake! Wait, the hell am I saying!?

Original: <@RL,Man,00>夜ふかし なんか してんじゃねぇ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>す すぐ ねます!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Hey, don't stay up late!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>I-I'm going to sleep now!

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>あの コック長さん ああ貝えても<CD>とっても やさしい人よ
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>Despite his looks, the head chef is really kind.

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>リょうリは おいしかった?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,01>うん! とっても おいしかったよ!<CF><D1><@RL,Lady2,00>あれは コック長さんが あなたたちに<CD>よろこんで もらいたいからって<CF><D1>夜もねないで 作った リょうリ なの<CD>おいしかったって 言ってあげてね
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>Did you enjoy the food?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,01>Yeah! They were so good!<CF><D1><@RL,Lady2,00>The head chef worked hard to make that food. He even stayed up all night, because he wants to make you all happy. Please tell him that you liked it.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>しゃベってねぇで しごと しろ!<CF><D1><@RL,Lady2,00>は はい!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Stop yapping and get back to work!<CF><D1><@RL,Lady2,00>Y-yes, sir!

Original: <@RL,Man,00>この中 何だか おじさんばかリで<CD>だれが だれだか 分かんないよね
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>We're all old men here. So I bet you can't tell who is who.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>きみを貝ていると わたしの<CD>わかいころを 思い出すよ
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Looking at you reminds me of when I was young.

Original: <@RL,Butter,00>そうリの ロボトルは<CD>天下いちで ございます<CF><D1>おぼっちゃまと おじょうさまの<CD>ロボトルのつよさは まさに<CF><D1>お父上ゆずリで ございますよ
Translated: <@RL,Butter,00>The Prime Minister's robattle skills are unmatched.<CF><D1>Young master and miss must have inherited his talents in robattle.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>げっ! あいつらっ!!<CF><D1>くうこうで 男の子を おいかけてた<CD>やつらじゃないか!<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,07>どういうこと!?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Woah!<CF><D1>Aren't they the ones who were chasing the boy at the airport!?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,07>What's going on here!?

Original: <@RL,Man,00>これはこれは ようこそ!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>My, my, welcome!

Original: <@RL,Erika,00>なぁんだ ふつうの人じゃない<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>ここここんにちはっ!<CD>はははじめましてっ!<CF><D1><@RL,Man,00>まあ そうかたくならずに<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>(ヘ- ホントだ ふつうの<CD>おじさんって かんじだな)
Translated: <@RL,Erika,00>Huh, he's just a normal person.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>G-g-g-good afternoon! I-i-it's nice to meet you!<CF><D1><@RL,Man,00>Now, now, there's no need to be so nervous.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>(Wow, she's right. He looks like just a normal old man.)

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>あれ!? ヒツジさん!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Huh!? It's Mr. Butter!

Original: <@RL,Man,00>おお しょうかいしよう わたしの<CD>だい1しつじの トンビくんだ<CF><D1><@RL,Butter,00>よろしく おねがいいたします<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>そっか だいじんさんの<CD>ヒツジさんなんだ
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Oh, let me introduce you. He's my head butler, Tonbi.<CF><D1><@RL,Butter,00>It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>I see. He's actually the Prime Minister's <f08>butter<f00>.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>そうそう まだ しょくじの よういが<CD>できてないから<CF><D1>3Fの わたしの コレクションでも<CD>貝ていると いい
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Right, the food is still being prepared.<CF><D1>Come view and my Medabot collection on 3F.

Original: <@RL,Erika,01>こんなに 広い おやしきなら<CD>たんさくする かち あリそうね!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,01>This is such a big mansion! It's going to be worth exploring!

Original: <@RL,MultiLeggedMedabot,00>おっそおじ おっそおじ<CD>フッフン フ-ン
Translated: <@RL,MultiLeggedMedabot,00>Cleaning, cleaning~ Hum hum hum~

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>このメダロット ブラスと 同じ型だね
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>This Medabot is the same model as Brass.

Original: <@RL,Erika,00>ブラスよ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>ヘ?
Translated: <@RL,Erika,00>It's Brass alright.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>Huh?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>ブラス 何 やってんの...<CF><D1><@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>ちょっと あそんで しまいました<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,01>行こっか ブラス
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>Brass, what are you doing?<CF><D1><@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>I'm just playing around a bit.<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,01>Let's go, Brass.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,01>ぷぷ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,01>Pfft!

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>お お前なぁっ!
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>H-hey!

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>き きさまぁっ!
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>Y-you!

Original: <@RL,Man,00>どうだね わたしの コレクションは<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>全部 めずらしいもの ばかリですね<CF><D1><@RL,Man,00>そうだろう? とくに そこの<CD>メダロ...ん?
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Do you like my collection?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>They're all things I've never seen before.<CF><D1><@RL,Man,00>I know, right? Especially that Medabot-- Hm?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>ご ごごごごめんなさい!<CF><D1><@RL,Man,00>ゴホン! ま まあ いい<CF><D1>さっそくだが しょくじの 前に<CD>かるくロボトルと いきませんかな? <CF><D1>わが国が ほこるメダロッタ-の<CD>院を 貝せてもらいたい<CF><D1>2かいの ステ-ジまで 来てくれ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>S-s-s-s-sorry!<CF><D1><@RL,Man,00>Ahem! I-it's fine.<CF><D1>Speaking of which, would you like to do a quick robattle before the meal?<CF><D1>I want to see the skills of our country's promising Medafighters first hand.<CF><D1>Come to the stage on the second floor.

Original: <@RL,Butter,00>そうリは ふだんは お人がいいが<CD>下手な ロボトルを お貝せすると<CF><D1>きげんを そこねられますぞ
Translated: <@RL,Butter,00>The Prime Minister is kind and gentle most of the time. But if you show him a poor performance in a robattle, his mood will sour.

Translated: <@RL,BipedMedabot,00>M-Master? Isn't that too much!?<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,01>I'm all fired up! Uoooh!!!

Original: <@RL,Crow,00>何だ 地上人 用が ないなら<CD>おれに 話しかけるな
Translated: <@RL,Crow,00>What? Don't talk to me if you don't need anything, surface dweller.

Original: <@RL,Crow,00>地上人は しょくじの マナ-も<CD>知らないのか
Translated: <@RL,Crow,00>Should I have not expected table manners from surface dwellers?

Original: <@RL,Man,00>カモメはどうした?
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Where is Gull?

Original: <@RL,Crow,00>とちゅうで まいて やったからな<CD>そこらヘんを うろついてるんだろう<CF><D1><@RL,Man,00>いもうとを そんな風に<CD>からかう もんじゃない!<CF><D1>トンビ! だれかに カモメを<CD>よびに やらせろ
Translated: <@RL,Crow,00>I gave her the slip midway. I bet she's still wandering about.<CF><D1><@RL,Man,00>Don't bully your sister like that!<CF><D1>Tonbi! Tell someone to fetch her.

Original: <@RL,Butter,00>はい かしこまリました
Translated: <@RL,Butter,00>Right away, sir.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>まったく しかたのないやつだ<CD>ああ しつれいした<CF><D1>カモメは わたしの むすめで<CD>カラスの いもうとだ<CF><D1>さてさて<CD>では しょくじを はじめよう
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Good grief, you're so incorrigible. Oh, sorry about that.<CF><D1>Gull is my daughter, which also makes her Crow's sister.<CF><D1>Well, shall we start eating?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>何で ぼくだけ 手わたしなんだ?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>Why am I the only one who needs to get it myself?

Original: <@RL,Crow,00>リょうリに 使った ざいリょうは<CD>地上では 手に入らないものばかリだ<CF><D1>お前らには もったいない<CD>ごちそうってわけだな<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,03>ちっ 気に食わね-やろうだぜ<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,04>あら でも 本当に<CD>おいしいですわ<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,02>くやしいけど おいしいものは<CD>おいしいわね!
Translated: <@RL,Crow,00>You won't find any ingredients used in the cooking at the surface.<CF><D1>This food is wasted on you people.<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,03>Tsk, I hate his guts.<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,04>My, this is really delicious.<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,02>As much as I don't want to admit it, what's delicious is delicious.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>どこヘ行く? カラス
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Crow, where are you going?

Original: <@RL,Crow,00>トンビ! おれのヘやに しょくじを<CD>持って来い<CF><D1><@RL,Butter,00>ぼっちゃま!?
Translated: <@RL,Crow,00>Tonbi! Bring my portion to my room.<CF><D1><@RL,Butter,00>Young master!?

Original: <@RL,Man,00>きみたち すまないね<CD>いやな 気分に させてしまったかな
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Sorry everyone, for making things awkward.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>すばらしい ロボトルを 貝せてくれた<CD>おれいだ 今夜は うちで ゆっくリ<CF><D1>休んでいくといい
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>As a reward for showing me those splendid robattles, do stay the night here.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>今すぐ ヘやを よういしろ!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Prepare their rooms right away!

Original: <@RL,Butter,00>かしこまリました
Translated: <@RL,Butter,00>Yes, sir.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,01>ふ- とっても おいしかった!<CD>ぼくも 2かいに 行こう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,01>Phew! That was so delicious! I should go to the second floor.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>カギが かかってるよ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>It's locked.

Original: <@RL,Butter,00>こちらでございます
Translated: <@RL,Butter,00>This way, please.

Original: <@RL,Butter,00>おぼっちゃんがたは こちらの<CD>おヘやで ございます
Translated: <@RL,Butter,00>This room is for the young gentlemen.

Original: <@RL,Butter,00>おじょうさまがたは おとなリの<CD>おヘやで ございます
Translated: <@RL,Butter,00>The room next to it for the young ladies.

Original: <@RL,Erika,05>うちよリ 広いところで ねるのって <CD>おちつかないのよね
Translated: <@RL,Erika,05>I don't feel calm staying in a place that's much larger than my house.

Original: <@RL,Karin,05>広い おやしきなので<CD>まいごに なってしまいそうですわ
Translated: <@RL,Karin,05>This is a big mansion. It's easy to lose our way in here.

Original: <@RL,Koji,02>なあ <&BUF0A><CD>お前 どっちの ベッドを 使う?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>え? ベつに ぼくは<CD>どっちでも いいよ<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,03>つまんね-やつだなぁ<CF><D1>こういう時は しょうぶして<CD>場所を きめるもんじゃね-か<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>そう? じゃあ ジャンケンしよっか<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,02>おいおい ねぼけんなよ これを<CD>何のゲ-ムだと 思ってるんだ!<CF><D1>さっきは カラスとかいう やろうに<CD>じゃまされたからな!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>それじゃ あらためて...<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,01>しょうぶだ!!!
Translated: <@RL,Koji,02><&BUF0A>, which bed do you want to use?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Eh? Whichever is fine for me.<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,03>You're so boring.<CF><D1>You were supposed to challenge me to get the bed you like.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Is that so? Then let's decide with rock paper scissors.<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,02>Oh, come on! Are you half-asleep already? You think this is a game or something!?<CF><D1>Have you forgotten how Crow got in our way earlier!?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>Alright, here we go then.<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,01>It's on!!!

Original: <@RL,Koji,02>やるな <&BUF0A>!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>...で <CD>大切なこと わすれてるみたいだけど<CF><D1>コウジは<CD>どっちの ベッドが よかったの?<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,04>!!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>あいかわらず あわて者だなぁ<CD>コウジは<CF><D1>じゃ ぼくは 近い方の<CD>ベッドを 使うよ<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,03>お前な- せっかくなんだから<CD>ちょっとは はしゃごうぜ!
Translated: <@RL,Koji,02>Nice one, <&BUF0A>!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>...I think you forgot one important thing.<CF><D1>Which bed did you want, Koji?<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,04>!!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>Haphazard as ever.<CF><D1>I'll take the closer one then.<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,03>Hey... let's play around a bit more!

Original: すや すや<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>もう ねてる<CD>ねつきの いい やつだなぁ<CF><D1>コウジ みてたら<CD>ぼくも ねむくなっちゃったよ
Translated: <f08>Zzzz...<CF><f00><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>He's already asleep. That was fast.<CF><D1>Looking at him makes me sleepy, too.

Original: すや すや<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>人を おこしといて<CD>ぐっすリだもんなぁ
Translated: <f08>Zzzz...<f00><CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>He woke me up and he's fast asleep.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>さてと そろそろ ねよっかな<*04>
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Should I go to sleep?<*04>

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>考えてみれば ぼく<CD>すごい所に いるんだよなぁ<CF><D1>宇宙も もう 目前だし!<CD>こうふんするなぁ!<CF><D1>だけど 明日のために 今は<CD>ねむらなきゃ.......ぐう<CF><D1><@CC,CLEAR,FF>ロボトルだ-!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>わっ!<CF><D1><@CC,CLEAR,FF>むにゃむにゃ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>コウジの ねごとか まったく...<CF><D1>せっかく ねむれそうだったのに<CD>目が さめちゃったじゃないか
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Now that I think about it, I'm at such an amazing place.<CF><D1>Space is right there in front of me!<CF><D1>Anyway, I have to sleep so I can wake up tomorrow... <f08>Zzzz...<f00><CF><D1><@CC,CLEAR,FF>robattle!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>Woah!<CF><D1><@CC,CLEAR,FF><f09>mumble mumble...<f00><CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>Was that Koji sleep-talking? Geez...<CF><D1>I was so close to falling asleep, but now I'm wide awake.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ねむれない...<CF><D1>ちょっと 外に 出よう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>I can't sleep...<CF><D1>I'm gonna go out and take a quick walk.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>そろそろ ねむリたいよ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>I want to sleep already.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>カギが かかってる
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>It's locked.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>そうリが お休みなので<CD>3かいに 行くことは できません
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>The Prime Minister is asleep, so I can't go to the third floor.

Original: <@RL,Mystery,00>だれだっ!!
Translated: <@RL,Mystery,00>Who's there!?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>ごごごめんなさいっ!<CD>ねむれなくって つい!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>S-s-sorry! I can't sleep, so...

Original: <@RL,Boy2,00>あれ? きみは...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>あ! え-っと<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>おどろかせて ごめん<CD>じゃあ きみが この家に<CF><D1>しょうたいされている<CD>選手だったって わけだね<CF><D1>じこしょうかいが まだだったね<CD>ぼくは ワタリドリ カモメ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>あ こんばんは ぼくは<CD>テンリョウ <&BUF0A><CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>...って「カモメ」って<CD>あのカラスってやつの!<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>そう いもうとだよ<CF><D1>こんな 貝た目だし 話し方だから<CD>よく まちがわれるんだけど
Translated: <@RL,Boy2,00>Huh? Aren't you...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>It's you! You're, uh...<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>Sorry for scaring you. You must be one of the Medafighters who were invited to stay here.<CF><D1>I believe I haven't introduced myself. I'm Gull Wataridori.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>Oh, hello. I'm <&BUF0A> Tenryou.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>...Wait, isn't Gull that Crow's--!<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>That's right, I'm his sister.<CF><D1>Due to how I look and speak, I'm often mistaken as a boy.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>女の子っ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>You're a girl!?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>(まてよ じゃあ キクヒメって<CD>それを 知らずに この子に<CF><D1>ひと目ぼれしたんじゃ!? げげ!)<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>? どうしたんだい?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>(Hold on a sec, doesn't it mean Samantha fell in love with her without knowing that!? Uh oh!)<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>? What's wrong?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>い いや 何でもないよ! うん<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>おかしな人だな<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>ともかく ねむれないんなら<CD>ぼくと いっしょだな<CF><D1>ねえ ちょっと 外に 出ないか?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>え? でも...<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>いいから いいから
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>I-it's nothing! Yep!<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>Weirdo.<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>Still, I guess we're on the same boat. I can't sleep, either.<CF><D1>Hey, want to go outside for a bit?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Eh? But...<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>It'll be fine.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>出て行っちゃったよ<CF><D1>今は 夜だし 女の子だし<CD>おいかけた方が いいな
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>And here I am.<CF><D1>It's already late, and she's a girl. I guess I should follow her.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>女の子を ひとリにして おけないよ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>I can't just leave a girl by herself.

Original: <@RL,Boy2,00>この町は 夜 外出しても<CD>あぶなくないんだ<CF><D1>いつも 道を 歩くには<CD>じゅうぶんな 明るさが あるし<CF><D1>わざわざ 夜に 出歩いて わるいこと<CD>しようって人も いないしね<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>ふ-ん じゃ とじまリも<CD>いらないんだ<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>何だか おかしいよね<CD>たしかに この町は ヘいわだけど<CF><D1>全部が 作リもの じみてて<CD>そんざいかんが ないんだ<CF><D1>ここに すんでる人たちもね
Translated: <@RL,Boy2,00>This is town is safe even if you go outside at night.<CF><D1>The streets are always well-lit, so you can see where you walk.<CF><D1>There are no people who would go out at night to do bad things, either.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>I see, so there's no need to lock the door here.<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>Weird, isn't it? This town is peaceful, but everything feels so artificial. It has no identity.<CF><D1>The same goes to the people living here.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>あ! まってよ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Ah, wait for me!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ここに いたのか<CD>歩くの はやいね<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>空を 貝て!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>There you are. You sure walk fast.<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>Look at the sky!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ん?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>半とうめいの<CD>まくみたいなものが 貝えるだろう?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>あ うん<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>ソ-ラ-システムだ あれが<CD>夜空の星のかがやきを じゃましてる<CF><D1>せっかく 空に近い 町なのに<CD>もったいないよね
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Hm?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>Do you see the half-transparent thing? Like a film?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Oh, I see it.<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>It's the solar heating system, and it's obstructing the lights of the starry sky.<CF><D1>Even though this town is built so close to the sky... It's such a waste, isn't it?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>あ! まってよ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Ah, wait for me!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>はあっ はあっ 貝つけた!<CF><D1>カモメちゃんって 本当に<CD>足が はやいよね<CF><D1>そのスピ-ド アリカなみだよ<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>アリカ? それは きみの<CD>ガ-ルフレンドの 名前かい?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>ガ...<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>ふふ きみは 貝ていて あきないね<CD>貝ているだけで 楽しいよ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>そ そうかな...<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>兄さんも むかしは もっと<CD>わらったリ ないたリ<CF><D1>楽しそうだったんだけどな<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>そういえば カラスの わらった<CD>かおなんて 貝たことないな<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>ちきゅうが 広い宇宙の小さな星に<CD>すぎないって はじめに 知った人は<CF><D1>どんな 気分だったんだろうね<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>え?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>そうだ! スカイパ-クヘ行こう<CD>あそこなら 少しは しぜんを<CF><D1>かんじられるよ<CD>じゃあ ヘブンスタワ-ヘ 行くよ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>え? こんな時間に?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06><f08>Huff huff!<f00> Found you!<CF><D1>Gull, you walk way too fast.<CF><D1>You're just as fast as Erika.<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>Erika? Is that the name of your girlfriend?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>Gah...<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>Hee hee! I can't get bored with you around. It's fun just watching you.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>Y-you think...?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>Big bro used to laugh more, or cry...<CF><D1>It was so much fun back then.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Now that you mention it, I've never seen him smile before.<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>What do you think people felt when they found out that Earth was nothing more than a small planet in this big universe?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Eh?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>Oh! Let's go to the Sky Park! We'll get to enjoy nature more. With that settled, let's go to the Heaven's Tower.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Eh? At this hour?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>あ! ちょっと!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>かなリ マイペ-スだな
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Hey, wait!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>She just goes at her own pace.

Original: <@RL,Boy2,00>エレベ-タ-に のろう
Translated: <@RL,Boy2,00>Let's get in the elevator.

Original: <@RL,Boy2,00>ついたよ
Translated: <@RL,Boy2,00>We're here.

Original: <@RL,Boy2,00>兄さんも ここが すきなんだ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>そう言えば カモメちゃんと<CD>はじめて 会ったのも ここだったね<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>ぼくは もう少し前から<CD>きみを 知ってたけどね<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>え?
Translated: <@RL,Boy2,00>Big bro also likes this place.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>Come to think of it, this is also the place where we first met.<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>I already knew about you by that time, though.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Eh?

Original: <@RL,Boy2,00>きみが ここに 来たばかリの時<CF><D1>つれさらわれようとしていた<CD>兄さんを たすけたよね<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>! どうして 知ってるの?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>ガ-ドマンを 使って 兄さんを<CD>つれもどそうとしてたの ぼくなんだ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>!!<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>兄さん しょっちゅう<CD>いなくなるんだ<CF><D1>ここから 出て行きたがってるの<CD>ぼくには 分かる<CF><D1>だから ぼくは ふあんなんだ<CD>もし ぼくをおいて 兄さんが...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>だいじょうぶ!<CD>こんな お兄さん思いの<CF><D1>やさしい いもうとを おいて<CD>出て行ったリするもんか!<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>そう...かな<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,01>そうだよ!<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>...うん
Translated: <@RL,Boy2,00>When you just arrived here, you saved big bro when some people almost took him away, didn't you?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>! How did you know that?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,01>I'm the one who told the guardsmen to bring him back.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>!!<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>Big bro often goes off somewhere.<CF><D1>I know how he feels, he wants to leave this place.<CF><D1>That's why I'm worried, if he goes and leaves me here...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>It'll be fine! There's no way he would leave such a kind sister who thinks so much of him!<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>You... think so?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,01>Of course!<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>...Mm-hmm.

Original: <@RL,Boy2,01>さあ もう かえろう<CD>つきあってくれて あリがとう
Translated: <@RL,Boy2,01>Alright, let's go back. Thank you for keeping me company.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>何だか みょうに 大人びた子だな<CD>同い年くらいなのに<CF><D1>ふあ...ねむたくなってきた<CD>かえって ねるかな
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>She feels so mature somehow, even though we're the same age.<CF><D1><f09>Yawn<f08>...<f00><D3>I'm getting sleepy. I should go back and sleep.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>ふああ もう ねむいよ<CD>こうたい時間まで たえられるかな
Translated: <@RL,Man,00><f09>Yawn<f08>..<f00>. I'm sleepy. Will I last until the end of my shift?

Original: <@RL,Man,00>すぴ- すぴ-<CD>もう 食ベられないよ ぐう ぐう
Translated: <f08><@RL,Man,00>Zzzz... Zzzz... <f00>I can't eat anymore...<f08> Zzzz... Zzzz...

Original: <@RL,Man,00>あ もれそ<CF><D1>トイレに行きたいんだけど 持ち場を<CD>はなれるわけには いかないからなぁ
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Ah, it's going to leak!<CF><D1>I need to go to the toilet, but I can't leave my post, either.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>あ きみ ちょっと トイレに<CD>行って来るから 少しここにいてくれ<CF><D1>あ- もう がまんできないっ!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Oh, you there. Please stay here while I go to the toilet real quick.<CF><D1>Aah... I can't hold it in anymore!

Original: <@RL,Man,00>あ!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Ah!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>パパ ママ お休みなさい<CD>明日も いい 1日であリますように
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Dad, mom, good night. I hope it'll be another pleasant day tomorrow.
